__e: What is this "beast" and where does he live?
You were an animal, a beast! You took me again and again until I passed out.
Don't make me feel silly, I won't make you feel guilty, all right?
A real beast wouldn't give warning.
It was he-- the beast I told you about.
Not only that, there are times you bring out the beast in me.
Move off, you beast - you are as bad as your master!
It's about the beast you saw.
You have killed some beast or other That you're wearing someone's brother Or perhaps it's someone's mother in which you're clad
- That's the dumbest idea I ever heard.
Watch yourself with him, baby, he's a dog with the dolls.
here I am, beast, with God's help you will soon be defeated.
And because I see your most secret acts, you will know me as the Beast With a Million Eyes.
Do you know what your asshole friend here wants me to do?
Don't worry, he's not as dumb as me.
